title: About
text:
Ayman Arman is a fourth year Finance major at the University of Alberta with a strong academic focus on coding, analytics, and securities markets. Having completed the co-op program, he’s had 3 experiences across mutual funds and banks.
Ayman regularly spends his time volunteering with at-risk youth as a part of the youth restorative action project where he serves as a board member. He visits the Edmonton Youth Offenders Centre 1-2 times per week to run programs, serves as the organization’s treasurer, manages the budget, applies for grants, corresponds with government agencies, and connects with community stakeholders.
For fun, Ayman played club soccer through his teen years as a goalie. In net, his team made it to inter-city championships winning silver and gold in two different years.
